title: Angels with Attributes of the Passion: Angel Holding the Vessel and Towel for washing the hands of Pontius Pilate
text: These angels (its companion hangs adjacent) carry symbols of the Passion - the events associated with Christ's suffering and death. This angel holds the pitcher, basin, and cloth used by Pontius Pilate to wash his hands of responsibility for Christ's crucifixion.
description: one of a pair of paintings of angels with symbols of the passion; other is 69.36.2
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
